helpers¶

This module contains various helper functions and classes.

Functions

abc2complex(u)

Transform three-phase quantities to a complex space vector.

complex2abc(u)

Transform a complex space vector to three-phase quantities.

plot(mdl, ctrl, base)

Plot example figures.

plot_im_extra(mdl, ctrl, base)

Plots extra waveforms for induction motors.

ref_ramp(mdl[, w_max, tau_max, t_max])

Generate an example ramp profile for the speed reference.

ref_step(mdl[, w_max, tau_max, t_max])

Generate an example stepwise profile for the speed reference and load torque.

Classes

Sequence(times, values[, periodic])

This class represents a sequence generator.

Step(step_time, step_value[, initial_value])

This data class represents a step function.
